message.content:
cs.NE, cs.ET, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY

The paper presents a neuromorphic system that uses device mismatch to perform learning tasks. This falls under the category of neural networks and machine learning, which is covered by cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Additionally, the paper discusses the statistical variability of the tuning curve of each neuron, which is related to the topic of electronic circuits and systems, covered by cs.ET (Embedded Systems). The paper also discusses the accuracy of the learning capability of the TAB, which is related to the topic of machine learning, covered by cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also presents a novel neuromorphic system, which is related to the topic of artificial intelligence, covered by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper discusses the effect of the number of hidden neurons and the resolution of output weights on the accuracy of the learning capability of the TAB, which is related to the topic of control systems and robotics, covered by cs.SY (Systems and Control).
